Melchana and Tankor were still unloading the Hellgate and storing the 
energon fruits in the Shadow Destiny. Hearing their names, they both 
turn around with a puzzled look.

Tankor: Belthassan, who's that guy? Newbie?

Belthassan: In some ways, yes, Tankor, he is. In fact, you have met 
him earlier.

Melchana: Odd one... I'll have to challenge him one day...

Belthassan: Stop that, sister. Our new friend is called Anachronox. I 
will present him to Daemos now.

----------------------------------

Daemos: I look forward to our meeting.

----------------------------------

Gesper hears Pacifix.

Gesper: Ah! He is that way! Come on, Crossroad!
--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox / Pacifix / Crossroads --
> 
> Anachronox nods and follows Belthassan. He enters the storage room 
> and looks for two bots.
> 
> ----------------------
> 
> "Alright," confirms Pacifix, "I'll see you in a little while. 
Pacifix 
> out." Pacifix pauses a moment to reflect, then stands. He looks into 
> the monitors, and frowns, <Where's Crossroads, he should be done 
> showing Gesper around by now. I'll have to find him.> Pacifix turns 
> and walks towards the exit of the control room.
> 
> ----------------------
> 
> Crossroads nods, "I think so, he was anxious to find out how 
> Firedrill was doing. He's probably contacted the Shadow Destiny by 
> now." As the continue down the corridor, he shrugs, "I wonder how 
> Firedrill's doing. I'll ask Pacifix when we find him."
